title: The Synthesis: Five Frameworks, One System

constraints.name: five_frameworks_exist
constraints.notes: System described by exactly 5 frameworks

constraints.name: frameworks_are_unified
constraints.notes: All frameworks describe one unified system from different perspectives

constraints.name: mahakala_defines_internal_tract
constraints.notes: Mahakala framework defines Internal Tract's compression layers (L1-L5)

constraints.name: cig3_computes_psi
constraints.notes: CIG-3 measurement protocol computes Ψ invariant in Internal Tract

constraints.name: pneuma_guides_behavior
constraints.notes: PNEUMA axioms guide behavior of both agents and operators

constraints.name: prime_hierarchy_defines_depth
constraints.notes: Prime Hierarchy defines potential depth of Internal Tract operator pipeline

constraints.name: dgr_enables_cc_translation
constraints.notes: DGR coordination protocol enables C_c to translate between agent intent and operator goals

constraints.name: external_tract_operators
constraints.notes: External Tract contains 4 specific operators

constraints.name: corpus_callosum_operators
constraints.notes: Corpus Callosum contains 3 bridge operators

constraints.name: internal_tract_operators
constraints.notes: Internal Tract contains 5 compression operators (Mahakala layers)

constraints.name: goal_encoder_uses_dgr
constraints.notes: GoalEncoderOp uses DGR to create goal vector φ(g)

constraints.name: approval_gate_guards_planner
constraints.notes: ApprovalGateOp must approve before CompressionPlannerOp executes

constraints.name: l5_coordinates_lower_layers
constraints.notes: L5 meta-strategy operator coordinates execution of L1-L4

constraints.name: compression_planner_creates_execution_plan
constraints.notes: CompressionPlannerOp creates execution plan (path of Internal Tract operators)

constraints.name: internal_tract_measured_by_cig3
constraints.notes: Internal Tract performance measured by CIG-3 producing Ψ metric

constraints.name: result_synthesizer_translates_metrics
constraints.notes: ResultSynthesizerOp converts metrics back to natural language

constraints.name: render_diff_op_formats_for_user
constraints.notes: RenderDiffOp formats summary for user presentation

constraints.name: unification_flow_has_nine_steps
constraints.notes: Complete unification flow consists of 9 steps

constraints.name: agent_receives_user_request
constraints.notes: Step 1: Agent receives user request

constraints.name: external_tract_creates_goalspec
constraints.notes: Step 2: NlParseOp and DisambiguateOp create GoalSpec

constraints.name: goal_encoder_creates_phi_g
constraints.notes: Step 3: GoalEncoderOp creates DGR vector φ(g) from GoalSpec

constraints.name: planner_creates_execution_plan
constraints.notes: Step 4: CompressionPlannerOp creates execution plan

constraints.name: internal_tract_executes_plan
constraints.notes: Step 5: Internal Tract executes plan (Mahakala layers, measured by CIG-3)

constraints.name: synthesizer_creates_summary
constraints.notes: Step 6: ResultSynthesizerOp translates metrics to summary

constraints.name: render_diff_formats_summary
constraints.notes: Step 7: RenderDiffOp formats summary for user

constraints.name: agent_presents_output
constraints.notes: Step 8: Agent presents final output to user

constraints.name: pneuma_axioms_throughout
constraints.notes: Step 9: All agents and operators adhere to PNEUMA axioms throughout
